Topic.Title: Multiple Endings in Choose Your Own Adventure?

Posts.EditableText: I'm making a choose your own adventure game and I was wondering if it was possible to have multiple endings? Sorry for the noob question I'm not used to using this!
Posts.HTML: I'm making a choose your own adventure game and I was wondering if it was possible to have multiple endings? Sorry for the noob question I'm not used to using this!

Posts.EditableText: Okay thanks...additional question - how do you create an ending? For example, something that takes you back to the beginning?
Posts.HTML: Okay thanks...additional question - how do you create an ending? For example, something that takes you back to the beginning?

Posts.EditableText:
> For example, something that takes you back to the beginning?

There's a `finish` command, but that just ends the game so the player will need to hit their 'refresh' button.

If you want a "Start over" link, you can just create a link back to the first page (and possibly have a script which sets any flags or variables you've used back to their initial values)
